thread.section_title: The Flights Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Flights Guru | theflightsguru.co.uk
thread.title: Victoria Burman
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by Victoria Burman

author: Victoria Burman
title: Victoria Burman
text: I've used Flight Guru twice now, and each time have saved hundreds of pounds. The operatives have been more than helpful and have always been very polite. I have no hesitation in recommending this company and will always use them to book future flights.
